text: Ani (smarana kara) jevha musane apalya samudayacya lokanna mhatale ki he majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Tumhi mala klesa yatana ka deta ahata, vastavika tumhala cangale mahita ahe ki mi tumacyakade allahaca rasula (paigambara) ahe. Tara jevha te loka vakadeca rahile tevha allahane tyancya hrdayanna anakhi vakade karuna takale, ani allaha avajnakari janasamuhala marga dakhavita nahi
